recipe.line: In a small saucepan combine the oil, garlic, and ginger over medium-low heat.
Allow mixture to heat up until the garlic is gently sizzling.
Add in spice mix and turn heat to lowest setting.
Stir gently and allow to infuse for 10 minutes.
Turn off heat and allow oil to cool then taste and adjust seasoning with salt.
Pour into a mason jar and keep refrigerated.
